description:
Implementing the chrome.runtime.getPlatformInfo API

This is part of the support for multi-crx downloads from the webstore.

BUG=180402

Committed: https://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=198703

messages.text:
lgtm

https://codereview.chromium.org/14960002/diff/2001/chrome/browser/extensions/api/runtime/runtime_apitest.cc
File chrome/browser/extensions/api/runtime/runtime_apitest.cc (right):

https://codereview.chromium.org/14960002/diff/2001/chrome/browser/extensions/api/runtime/runtime_apitest.cc#newcode40
chrome/browser/extensions/api/runtime/runtime_apitest.cc:40: EXPECT_TRUE(dict->HasKey("os"));
Aww, aren't you going to come up with an independent way to verify that the os value is correct?

https://codereview.chromium.org/14960002/diff/2001/chrome/browser/extensions/api/runtime/runtime_apitest.cc#newcode41
chrome/browser/extensions/api/runtime/runtime_apitest.cc:41: EXPECT_TRUE(dict->HasKey("arch"));
Awww, what about #ifdefs to confirm the value?

CQ is trying da patch. Follow status at
https://chromium-status.appspot.com/cq/asargent@chromium.org/14960002/2001

CQ is trying da patch. Follow status at
https://chromium-status.appspot.com/cq/asargent@chromium.org/14960002/2001

subject: Implementing the chrome.runtime.getPlatformInfo API
